title.rendered: Are you eligible for the $1,400 stimulus check?

content.rendered: The recently passed American Rescue Plan means that millions of individuals will be receiving a third round of stimulus checks. Optima CEO David King and Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang answer questions about who is and who is not eligible to receive the most recent economic payment, as well as how to file an extension to ensure the IRS has your most recent information.
